name: Addiction Slice - The Super Addictive Slash, Cut and Swipe Free Puzzle Game
name_original: Addiction Slice - The Super Addictive Slash, Cut and Swipe Free Puzzle Game
description:
Swipe, slash and carve your way through 50 awesome challenging levels, testing your wits and reaction skills to the limit. Welcome to Addiction Slice!

Are you up for the Sphere challenge in this super neat puzzler game? Contain all the spheres together in one place by slicing away at the level shapes, whatever you do, don’t let them escape!

Visit the Store for essential coins and grab yourself some cool power ups including slow motion, mega bombs and instant wipe out, all waiting for addiction fanatics who wanna just get to the next level.

Slice your way to the top of the Game Centre Leaderboards and challenge your friends.

Features:

- 50 Puzzle levels for puzzle addicts everywhere
- Awesome ambient House soundtrack
- Cool Power up Store
- Game Centre Leaderboards

Find Us Online;
